summary: This is a declaration by Alyssa Anderson, Custodian of Records for Oath Holdings Inc. (formerly Yahoo Holdings, Inc.), submitted in response to a December 19, 2018 subpoena. It authenticates attached data from Yahoo user accounts, including profiles and login information, for use as evidence.

persons.name: Alyssa Anderson
persons.role: Custodian of Records for Oath Holdings Inc.
persons.context: She is the authorized declarant who submits business records from Oath/Yahoo in response to a subpoena, authenticating user account data.

events.title: Subpoena Issued for Yahoo Account Data
events.description: A subpoena was issued requesting information regarding user accounts from Oath/Yahoo, likely as part of an investigation.

events.title: Declaration of Business Records Submitted
events.description: Alyssa Anderson signed and submitted this declaration, authenticating Yahoo account data in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: This document is a response to a December 19, 2018 subpoena, indicating an active investigation at that time.
Oath Holdings Inc. (formerly Yahoo Holdings, Inc.) produced user profile data and login/authentication event records from its Yahoo services.
The data is authenticated under Federal Rules of Evidence Rule 902(11) and California Code of Evidence section 1561 for use in legal proceedings.
The declaration notes that user information may not be verified as Yahoo offers many free services.
The document includes an internal reference number (399267) and file identifier (EFTA00083913).
